name: Safety Driving Simulator: Car
description:
Safety Driving Simulator: Car is a driving simulator engaging and enjoyable that teaches the basics of driving immersing the player in a detailed and realistic urban environment. A tool widely used today by schools, government, driving-schools and health associations. Choose from a variety of cars, sedans and sport cars and different scenarios. If you ever wanted to know how driving under influence will effect sight and reaction – now you can experience it yourself.Features
  • Choose between utility cars, sedans and sport cars
  • Cities, extra-urban and off-road scenarios
  • Realistic viability: one way roads, yield signs, traffic lights, pedestrians and much more...
  • Traffic offenses detection
  • Alcohol and drugs simulation
